name: Bandar Udara Internasional Husein Sastranegara
description: Husein Sastranegara International Airport was built by Dutch settlers in the colonial period, which then named after an Indonesian aviation hero from West Java, Husein Sastranegara. It receives its code from *B*an*DO*eng, the old spelling of city of 'Bandung', where itâ€™s located.
